DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming damage by 10% each, up to 7. Reduced by 2 each turn. You are in Close Range at Distance 0-2, Mid Range at distance 3-6, and Long Range at 7 and above.
Prevents the next instance of turn-based Distance loss.
When you play 2 Skills in a turn, apply Mark to all enemies.
When you play 3 Attacks in a turn, apply Poison to all enemies.
When you play 2 cards in a turn, remove Artifact from all enemies, and apply Poison, Weak, and Vulnerable.
When you lose 4 Distance in a turn, apply Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies.
When you gain 4 Distance in a turn, deal damage to ALL enemies.
When your Block is broken, gain Block and 1 Blur.
When you go a turn without being attacked, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.
When you activate a #yTrap, fill your #yTrap slots with random #yTraps.
Placed in a Trap Slot. Activates when certain conditions are met.
